title: Com Hem 2025 Company Profile: Valuation, Investors, Acquisition | PitchBook
snippet: Com Hem has raised $1.35B. Ardian, BC Partners, EQT, Kinnevik, and Providence Equity Partners are 5 of 7 investors who have invested in Com Hem.

title: Com Hem
snippet: Q3 Announcement 2025 · Presentation · Webcast · Transcript · Divestment · EQT III acquired Com Hem AB, a Swedish cable TV operator, in 2003. Com Hem was one of the largest operators in Sweden, offering pay-TV and broadband internet access as the leading player in an attractive market.

title: Hem - 2025 Company Profile, Team, Funding & Competitors - Tracxn
snippet: Hem - Internet-first brand of multi-category home improvement products. Acquired by Vitra. Raised a total funding of $5M over 1 round from 12 investors.

title: Com Hem AB - 2025 Company Profile, Team, Funding, Competitors & Financials - Tracxn
snippet: Com Hem AB - Media group providing broadband, TV and telephony services. Acquired by Tele2. Raised funding over 3 rounds from 1 investor.
